sen.j: 京都 - 舞鶴線（きょうと - まいづるせん）は、京都市と綾部市・舞鶴市を結ぶ高速バスである。
sen.e: Kyoto – Maizuru Line is a highway bus that connects Kyoto City and Ayabe City/Maizuru City.
Kyoto – Maizuru Route is a highway bus that connects Kyoto City and Ayabe City/Maizuru City.
Kyoto – Maizuru Route is a highway bus that connects Kyoto City and Ayabe City/Maizuru City.
The seat of all the buses must be complemented for the operation.
The seat of all the buses must be complemented for the operation.
The seat of all the buses must be complemented for the operation.

sen.j: 初代京都交通時代は、国道本線の一員として扱われていた。
sen.e: When Kyoto Kotsu began the operation, the line was belonged to the national highway main route bus service.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: When Kyoto Kotsu began the operation, the route was belonged to the national highway main route bus service.
When Kyoto Kotsu began the operation, the route was belonged to the national highway main route bus service.

sen.j: 種別も下から快速・特急（末期にはスーパー特急も加わる）の3本立て構成で、運行経路も複雑だった。
sen.e: There were rapid service, limited express service (they began super limited express service just before the company quit the management), and many, complicated routes.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: There were rapid service, limited express service (they began super limited express service just before the company quit the management), and many, complicated routes.
There were rapid service, limited express service (they began super limited express service just before the company quit the management), and many, complicated routes.
History
History
History

sen.j: 2005年（平成17年）4月1日：阪急桂バス停、四条河原町バス停行きを廃止。
sen.e: April 1, 2005: They abolished the buses that had run to Hankyu Katsura Bus Stop/Shijo-kawara-machi Bus Stop.
April 1, 2005: They abolished the buses that had run to Hankyu Katsura Bus Stop/Shijo Kawaramachi Bus Stop.
sen.cmt: Shijo Kawaramachi 煮訂正しました。
sen.e: April 1, 2005: They abolished the buses that had run to Hankyu Katsura Bus Stop/Shijo Kawaramachi Bus Stop.
There remained only the buses that ran from/to Kyoto Station-mae.
There remained only the buses that ran from/to Kyoto Station-mae.
There remained only the buses that ran from/to Kyoto Station-mae.

sen.j: 2006年（平成18年）3月21日：好調な舞鶴－神戸便に車両投入のため、1日5往復より1日4便に減便。
sen.e: March 21, 2006: As they had switched one of the cars to more profitable Maizuru – Kobe Line, they reduced the operations from five round services a day to four round services a day.
March 21, 2006: As they had switched one of the cars to more profitable Maizuru – Kobe Route, they reduced the operations from five round services a day to four round services a day.
March 21, 2006: As they had switched one of the cars to more profitable Maizuru – Kobe Route, they reduced the operations from five round services a day to four round services a day.

sen.j: 2008年（平成20年）10月21日：綾部安国寺IC-京丹波わちIC間を国道27号線経由から京都縦貫自動車道に変更し、途中の綾部大橋バス停を廃止。
sen.e: October 21, 2008: As they had switched the National Highway 27 route, which connected Ayabe Ankoku-ji Interchange and Kyo Tanba-wachi Interchange, to the new Kyoto Jukan Expressway route, which connected the same two bus stops, they abolished Ayabe Ohashi Bus Stop of the former route.

October 21, 2008: As they had switched the National Highway 27 route, which connected Ayabe Ankoku-ji Interchange and Kyo Tanba-wachi Interchange, to the new Kyoto Jukan Expressway route, which connected the same two bus stops, they abolished Ayabe Ohashi Bus Stop of the former route.

October 21, 2008: As they had switched the National Highway 27 route, which connected Ayabe Ankoku-ji Interchange and Kyo Tanba-wachi Interchange, to the new Kyoto Jukan Expressway route, which connected the same two bus stops, they abolished Ayabe Ohashi Bus Stop of the former route.
The current operating company
The current operating company
The current operating company
Kyoto Kotsu in Maizuru City
Kyoto Kotsu in Maizuru City
Kyoto Kotsu in Maizuru City

sen.j: 舞鶴営業所が昼行4往復を担当。
sen.e: The Maizuru office operates four round buses in the daytime.
The Maizuru office operates four round buses in the daytime.
The Maizuru office operates four round buses in the daytime.

sen.j: 京都での発券・運行支援業務は西日本ジェイアールバスが担当。
sen.e: West Japan JR Bus Company assists Kyoto Kotsu in selling the tickets and operating.
West Japan JR Bus Company assists Kyoto Kotsu in selling the tickets and operating.
West Japan JR Bus Company assists Kyoto Kotsu in selling the tickets and operating.
The bus stops
The bus stops
The bus stops

sen.j: ▼…下りは乗車のみ、上りは降車のみの扱い
sen.e: ▼…The mark indicates that you can only get on the down bus, and you can only get off the up bus.
Karasuma Exit of Kyoto Station: It operates only boarding for down-bound (Kyoto - Maizuru) and only alighting for up-bound (Maizuru - Kyoto).
sen.cmt: Web原文を確認したところ、記号は表の各停留所に対応していました。追加の説明が必要だと思います。「京都駅前（烏丸口）：下り（京都-舞鶴)は乗車のみ、上り(舞鶴-京都)は降車のみの扱い」として訂正しました。記号削除しました。
sen.e: Karasuma Exit of Kyoto Station: It operates only boarding for down-bound (Kyoto - Maizuru) and only alighting for up-bound (Maizuru - Kyoto).

sen.j: ▲…上りは乗車のみ、下りは降車のみの扱い
sen.e: ▲…The mark indicates that you can only get on the up bus, and you can only get off the down bus.
Nishi Maizuru Station/Naka Maizuru Station/Maizuru Office: It operates only boarding for up-bound (Maizuru - Kyoto) and only alighting for down-bound (Kyoto - Maizuru).
sen.cmt: Web原文を確認したところ、記号は表の各停留所に対応していました。追加の説明が必要だと思います。「西舞鶴駅前・中舞鶴・東舞鶴駅前・舞鶴営業所 ：上り(舞鶴-京都)は乗車のみ、下り（京都-舞鶴)は降車のみの扱い」として訂正しました。記号削除しました。
sen.e: Nishi Maizuru Station/Naka Maizuru Station/Maizuru Office: It operates only boarding for up-bound (Maizuru - Kyoto) and only alighting for down-bound (Kyoto - Maizuru).

sen.j: 京都市南区内 - 久世橋通 - 国道9号 - 沓掛インターチェンジ - 京都縦貫自動車道 - 丹波インターチェンジ - 国道9号 - 国道27号 - 京丹波わちインターチェンジ - 京都縦貫自動車道 - 綾部安国寺インターチェンジ - 国道27号 - 舞鶴市内
sen.e: Minami-ku-nai of Kyoto City – Kuze-bashi-dori – National Highway 9 – Kutsukake Interchange – Kyoto Jukan Expressway – Tanba Interchange – National Highway 9 – National Highway 27 – Kyo-Tanba-wachi Interchange – Kyoto Jukan Expressway – Ayabe Ankoku-ji Interchange – National Highway 27 – Maizuru City-nai

Internal Minami Ward, Kyoto City – Kuzebashi-dori – National Highway 9 – Kutsukake Interchange – Kyoto Jukan Expressway – Tanba Interchange – National Highway 9 – National Highway 27 – Kyo-Tanba-wachi Interchange – Kyoto Jukan Expressway – Ayabe Ankoku-ji Interchange – National Highway 27 – Internal Maizuru City
sen.cmt: Internal Minami Ward, Kyoto Cityに訂正しました。ハイフン削除しました。Internal Maizuru Cityに訂正しました。
sen.e: Internal Minami Ward, Kyoto City – Kuzebashi-dori – National Highway 9 – Kutsukake Interchange – Kyoto Jukan Expressway – Tanba Interchange – National Highway 9 – National Highway 27 – Kyo-Tanba-wachi Interchange – Kyoto Jukan Expressway – Ayabe Ankoku-ji Interchange – National Highway 27 – Internal Maizuru City
